message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn for a slightly better deal. This is a good offer, take it while it's still worthwhile for you!
I'll meet you halfway on the last offers
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm being more than fair, but my patience (and the value of your share) is dwindling.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want a bigger share
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Half the rounds are gone and your money is worth almost 35% less. I'm offering a very slight advantage for me, take it or leave it. This is my final offer.
